caption.p: IC 50 values calculation using dose response analysis. (a) Serial dilutions of BvRM extract were used and 3.731 µg/mL dose was found as IC 50. (b) Serial dilutions of BvLM extract were used and 4.991 µg/mL dose was counted as IC 50. (c) Serial dilutions of standard drug (donepezil) were used and 3.691 µg/mL dose was found as IC 50.
